title: New: Young Wonder – Time (Feat. Sacred Animals)
body:
**Young Wonder**, an Irish duo comprised of Ian Ring and Rachel Koeman are rapidly creating a name for themselves.

Having played a support slot for Mercury winners Alt-J back in January, the two-piece are set to release their new EP Show Your Teeth on 6 May via [Feel Good Lost Records](www.feelgoodlost.me). _Time_, featuring the vocal talents of Wexford musical magician **Sacred Animals**, is arguably their career highlight to date, and certainly marks a step up in terms of production capabilities. Gorgeously twisting and inescapable pop, it’s a further step towards what is set to be a mightily impressive 2013 for **Young Wonder**.
